Title: Bambukat
Actors: Ammy Virk, Simi Chahal, Binnu Dhillon, Sheetal Thakur
Plot: Bambukat, set in 1960, is a story about two sisters. One is a simple girl, Pakko, who's not fair skinned and look dusky, and Sami, who is prettier than Pakko. The story of Bambukat is how Pakko's husband tries to impress his in-laws.
